thread.title: 10 Hollywood Stars And Their Beloved Pets
thread.title_full: 10 Hollywood Stars And Their Beloved Pets

title: 10 Hollywood Stars And Their Beloved Pets
text:
facebook 159 SHARES 
Hollywood stars may lead very different lives from â€˜regular people', but there are certain things that just bind us all together. Like love for animals. Just like we tend to be be obsessed with our pets, there are certain Hollywood celebrities who have an unending affection for their furry babies as well. And it makes our heart extremely happy to see the love they share. So, to give you all some warm and fuzzy feelings this Thursday afternoon, here are some Hollywood celebrities with their beloved pets. Hugh Jackman, walking his two dogs, Allegra and Dali in New York City Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth have a brood of seven - Dora, Emu, Mary Jane, Tani, Bean, Happy and Barbie John Legend and Chrissy Teigen are parents to Puddy, Penny, Puey and Pippa, apart from baby Luna Taylor Swift adores her beautiful cats, Meredith and Olivia Kylie Jenner already had Norman, Bambi, Ernie and Penny, but now has two new pups, who were born to her oldest dogs Katy Perry has two of the cutest pups in the world, Butters and Nugget Ellen DeGeneres and Portia De Rossi are parents to Wolf, Augie and Kid Image credit: Getty Images, Instagram
